channel.title: kotlin on Biologically Plausible Programming
channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on Biologically Plausible Programming

item.title: Kotlin Classes for the Python Developer
item.description: Introduction For anyone who has followed the tech scene and/or Android Development for some time, Kotlin, a language developed at JetBrains is likely familiar. The language has also received a lot of media attention as the future of Android development, receiving backing from tech giant, Google. To understand why this is the case, I have recently started learning Kotlin mainly for fun and to see how well the language lives up to its hype (praise).
